professional_summary: Experience with SQL server database and excellent client skills seeking a junior position. Aiming to utilize technical knowledge in a dynamic organization while advancing skills in a motivated environment.

key_responsibilities: Experience with SQL Server database administration and technical skills in MS SQL Server 2016 and 2017.
Documentation of SQL server builds and dependencies.
Maintenance of change control and testing processes for database modifications.
Monitoring and maintenance of data communications systems.
Setup and installation of software on client computers.
Client support activities including tracking system updates.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
